pages.title: Coins, Gems and Pearls
pages.text: Some of the loot you may find or harvest are treasure coins, gems, or pearls.$(br)$(bold)Coins$()$(br) $(li)Gold Coin$()$(li)Silver Coin$()$(br)Gold is the rarer and more valuable of the two.$(br)$(b)Gems$()$(br)There are two kinds of gems - Ruby and Sapphire, which are both equal in value.($br)$(b)Pearls$()$(br)There are two kinds of pearls
